title: Developing Professional Identity for Prospective Agricultural Teachers Through Adolescent Literature

context.prior_knowledge: Basic agricultural education theory and understanding of elementary school curricula
context.additional_context: A digital device-enabled environment supporting collaboration and project execution.

learning_goals: Participants can analyze adolescent literature texts and concretely design integration methods with agricultural education content
Participants develop at least two agricultural education scenarios applying multidisciplinary approaches through project-based learning (PBL)
Participants present their teacher professional identity formation process as a portfolio based on peer feedback and reflective journals
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
